titles.title: MP622 Take, Eat, This Is My Body

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My blood was shed for many,
Taking away your sin,
And if I shall make you free
Then you shall be free indeed,
You shall be free indeed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though your sins be as scarlet
They shall be white as snow,
Though they be red like crimson
They shall be as wool,
They shall be as wool.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For God so loved the world
He gave His only Son,
That whosoever believeth on Him
Might have everlasting life,
Might have everlasting life.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Take, eat, this is my body,
Broken for you,
For I am come that you might have life;
Eat of My flesh and live,
Eat of My flesh and live.
